# Product Requirements Document: Dark Mode

## Problem Statement

Users want a dark mode option for reduced eye strain.

## User Personas

- Night owl developers
- Users with light sensitivity

## Scope

### In Scope
- Theme toggle component
- CSS variable system
- User preference persistence

### Out of Scope
- Custom color themes
- Scheduled auto-switching
